name: @elucidata/pulse
description: Microscopic signals with automatic dependency tracking.
author: Matthew Mccray

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && tsup ./src/index.ts ./src/utils/index.ts ./src/react/index.ts ./src/view/index.ts ./src/view/html.ts --dts --format esm --minify --external react  && bun run stats
scripts.dist:dev: rm -rf dist && tsup ./src/index.ts ./src/utils/index.ts ./src/react/index.ts ./src/view/index.ts ./src/view/html.ts --dts --format esm --external react  --no-splitting  && bun run stats
scripts.stats:all: gzip -c9 dist/index.js dist/chunk*.js dist/utils/index.js dist/react/index.js dist/view/index.js dist/view/html.js | wc -c | numfmt --to=si
